entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Shawinigan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:44 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shawinigan 10:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -8.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: -10.6°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
